# Draft:Thy Kingdom Scum

| label        = Metal Blade Records

Thy Kingdom Scum is the fourth studio album by Japanese stoner/doom metal band Church of Misery, released in 2013 under both Rise Above Records and Metal Blade Records for the North American release.
The album cover features German serial killer Peter Kürten, also known as the "Vampire of Düsseldorf".
Track listing
Personnel
* Tatsu Mikami – bass
* Junji Narita – drums
* Hideki Fukasawa – vocals/synthesizer
* Ikuma Kawabe – guitar
References
